Entries.Thu: Micah is a great help! he's incredibly smart for his age. #$b#Sometimes it feels like he even knows more than I do!
Entries.Sun: My little invention exploded last night.$s#$e#I should ask Micah for some help.
Entries.Fri2: Micah is a good friend of mine.#$b#He teaches me a lot about things like servos and I teach him more detailed circuitry.#$e#It's a good arrangement! And we share our projects with each other.
Entries.Tue4: Demetrius has been real welcoming to me.#$b#I'm afraid he might get the wrong idea. Micah's like a little brother to me.#$e#I'm actually rooting for Penny and Micah.$h

Entries.Thu: Micah is a great help! he's incredibly smart for his age. #$b#Sometimes it feels like he even knows more than I do!
Entries.Sun: My little invention exploded last night.$s#$e#I should ask Micah for some help.
Entries.Fri2: Micah is a good friend of mine.#$b#He teaches me a lot about things like servos and I teach him more detailed circuitry.#$e#It's a good arrangement! And we share our projects with each other.
Entries.Tue4: Demetrius has been real welcoming to me.#$b#I'm afraid he might get the wrong idea. Micah's like a little brother to me.#$e#I'm actually rooting for Peter and Micah.$h

Entries.summer_10: I've been working with Micah to create a machine to help move the Luau pot for tomorrow.#$b#Poor Ian always gets so worn out carrying the thing he passes out in the sand after we eat, ha ha!$h
Entries.fall_26: Shh, don't tell anyone, but Micah and I messed with the lights in the town square.#$b#At midnight they'll turn a deep red to be all spooky. Ha ha!$h#$b#That should give the kiddos a bit of a fright.$h
Entries.winter_24: Micah and I have been working overtime to make sure the festival goes off without a hitch tomorrow.#$b#We used a new generator to get some extra juice for the tree and all the lights. On the one hand, it could all go off smoothly! But on the other... well, just stay away from the tree just in case, okay?#$b#I'm sure it'll be fine, but... ha ha, well, you know.$h
Entries.spouseRoom_Kenneth: {{Random: I've been working on a new project. It's another little robot!#$b# It won't be over-the-top this time, though. Just a little hobby to pass the time.$h#$b# Hm... I wonder if I can make it like a small robot butler..., @... what do you think about a robot with dog elements?#$b#I'm not going to build a dog, I just think it might be nice if it looked friendly., Micah sent me some designs she found on the internet. There are some really creative people out in the world, aren't there?, I can't find the draft blueprints of a project I recently thought of.#$b#Oh well, I vaguely remember the details, I just forgot what the design was.#$b#I guess it's back to the drawing board!$6, Newer technology can do so much, but I also like working with older electronics. They're sturdy and reliable.}}
Entries.funLeave_Kenneth: {{Random: I'm going to work hard today, @.#$b#Well, I mean, I always work hard, but I want to do especially well now. Seeing you work, I don't want to do any less than my best.$h, Hi, @! I'm going to go out for a walk today. I have some stuff to check on.#$b#I heard Micah has a new invention he wants to show me, too. Hope you have a fun day!, I'm heading out on my rounds. I'll try not to stay out too late for you., I'm off a little early today. I'm testing meters today, so it'll be quite a lot of work., @, let me know if you need anything while I'm out. I'll be happy to grab it on my rounds, as long as it won't melt.$h}}
Entries.funReturn_Kenneth: {{Random: Man, I had a great day today. Everything in town is working smoothly.#$b#How was your day? I hope it was great, too!$h, Sorry if I smell a little burned. I had some wiring that caught on fire and the smell lingers.$s, Phew! I almost fell from the ladder when I was checking one of the lamps earlier!$u#$b#Turns out it was just Keahi. He accidentally bumped the ladder when Trinnie was chasing him.$6#$b#That was frightening!$s, I'm back. The town was pretty uneventful, but I almost turned my ankle coming off the ladder.#$b#I'll be more careful in the future, so don't worry., @, are you familiar with hobbits?#$b#Well, it's just... Micah was telling me a joke he wanted to tell Sebastian, but I don't think I really understood it.$4}}
Entries.Good_2: %Kenneth seems lost in thought. #$b#Oh, sorry. This machine I'm working on isn't working the way I want it to. Maybe I should ask Micah for assistance.

Entries.Tue8: Hey, what's up, @!$h#$e#Can I go inside your house and watch TV?#$b#I haven't watched my cartoons and mom won't let me watch during the day.$s#$e#I was helping Keahi look for something called flash paper, but then he went and asked Micah for help instead of me.

Entries.Blair: Micah! What does this bottle do?$h#$b#Can I drink it?#$b#%Blair grabs the bottle and lifts it close to her nose.#$b#Ay dios mio! That's nasty!$u#$b#Better hide this from Keahi! He might use it against us!$h
Entries.Kenneth: I'm interested in seeing Micah's little robot over there.#$b#I'll go take a quick look later.#$e#Oh! I should show Sam the new amplifier I've been working on!$h

Entries.Blair: Micah! What does this bottle do?$h#$b#Can I drink it?#$b#%Blair grabs the bottle and lifts it close to her nose.#$b#Ay dios mio! That's nasty!$u#$b#Better hide this from Keahi! He might use it against us!$h
Entries.Kenneth: I'm interested in seeing Micah's little robot over there.#$b#I'll go take a quick look later.#$e#Oh! I should show Samantha the new amplifier I've been working on!$h

Lenny found out about me and Micah messing with the lights and made us change them back.#$e#She did get a laugh out of it, though. She's always a good sport.#$b#...Don't tell her, but Micah and I still changed her porch light to a red bulb!$h
